cards.name: Blessed Breath
cards.text:
Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
Splice onto Arcane {W} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

rulings.text: You reveal all cards you intend to splice at the same time. Each individual card can be spliced only once onto any one spell.
A card with a splice ability can’t be spliced onto itself because the spell is on the stack (and not in your hand) when you reveal the cards you want to splice onto it.

You choose all targets for the spell after revealing cards you want to splice, including any targets required by the text of any of those cards. You may choose a different target for each instance of the word “target” on the resulting spell.
If all of the spell’s targets are illegal when the spell tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen.

"The landscape shimmered and I felt a chill breeze. When my vision cleared, I found myself alone among the corpses of my fallen friends."
—Journal found in Numai

rulings.text: The creature comes back onto the battlefield as a new creature, with one +1/+1 counter on it (plus any other counters that it would normally enter the battlefield with).
Any Aura attached to the creature is put into its owner’s graveyard as a state-based action. Equipment attached to the creature become unattached but remain on the battlefield.
If Otherworldly Journey is cast during an end step, the creature won’t return until the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Reverse the Sands
cards.text: Redistribute any number of players' life totals. (Each of those players gets one life total back.)
cards.flavorText: Worse than the years of aging was the burden of memory. The young monk lost his youth and gained a vicarious lifetime of hardship and woe.

rulings.text: You choose which player gets which life total when the spell resolves.

You can’t split up a life total when you redistribute it. For example, suppose that in a two-player game your life total is 5 and your opponent’s life total is 15 when Reverse the Sands starts to resolve. You can choose to (a) leave the life totals as they are or (b) make your life total 15 and your opponent’s 5. You can’t choose to make your life total 20 and your opponent’s 0.

cards.name: Yosei, the Morning Star
cards.text:
Flying
When Yosei, the Morning Star dies, target player skips their next untap step. Tap up to five target permanents that player controls.

rulings.text: If any of the targets of Yosei’s ability are illegal, they won’t be tapped.
If all of the permanents targeted by Yosei’s ability become illegal targets, nothing becomes tapped, but the target player still skips their untap step.
If the player becomes an illegal target, the target permanents are tapped, but the player doesn’t skip their untap step.
If a permanent won’t untap during its controller’s next untap step, that effect waits to apply until its controller has an untap step that isn’t skipped.

If more than one effect instructs a player to skip their next untap step, such as if Yosei dies more than once in a turn, that player skips that many untap steps. This is different from effects that state that something doesn’t untap during an untap step.

cards.name: Consuming Vortex
cards.text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Splice onto Arcane {3}{U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

rulings.text: You reveal all cards you intend to splice at the same time. Each individual card can be spliced only once onto any one spell.
A card with a splice ability can’t be spliced onto itself because the spell is on the stack (and not in your hand) when you reveal the cards you want to splice onto it.

You choose all targets for the spell after revealing cards you want to splice, including any targets required by the text of any of those cards. You may choose a different target for each instance of the word “target” on the resulting spell.
If all of the spell’s targets are illegal when the spell tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen.

cards.name: Dampen Thought
cards.text:
Target player mills four cards.
Splice onto Arcane {1}{U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

rulings.text: You reveal all cards you intend to splice at the same time. Each individual card can be spliced only once onto any one spell.
A card with a splice ability can’t be spliced onto itself because the spell is on the stack (and not in your hand) when you reveal the cards you want to splice onto it.

You choose all targets for the spell after revealing cards you want to splice, including any targets required by the text of any of those cards. You may choose a different target for each instance of the word “target” on the resulting spell.
If all of the spell’s targets are illegal when the spell tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen.

cards.name: Gifts Ungiven
cards.text: Search your library for up to four cards with different names and reveal them. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle.

rulings.text: You can choose to find fewer than four cards if you want. If you find one or two cards, your opponent must choose for them to be put into your graveyard, even if they don’t want to.

foreignData.name: Ungegebene Geschenke

foreignData.name: Dons non-donnés

foreignData.name: Doni Mai Dati

foreignData.name: けちな贈り物

foreignData.name: Dádiva Retirada

foreignData.name: 未送出的礼物

cards.name: Graceful Adept
cards.text: You have no maximum hand size.
cards.flavorText:
"When you have mastered my lessons, it will seem as though the whole of the world has opened up to your mind and nothing is beyond your grasp."
—Lady Azami

rulings.text: If multiple effects modify your hand size, apply them in timestamp order. For example, if you put Null Profusion (an enchantment that says your maximum hand size is two) onto the battlefield and then put Graceful Adept onto the battlefield, you’ll have no maximum hand size. However, if those permanents entered the battlefield in the opposite order, your maximum hand size would be two.

foreignData.flavorText:
„Wenn du meine Lektionen gemeistert hast, wird es dir erscheinen, als ob sich die Weite der Welt in deinem Kopf geöffnet hat und nichts außerhalb deiner Reichweite liegt."
—Herrin Azami
foreignData.name: Anmutiger Adept
foreignData.text: Es gibt keine Obergrenze für die Anzahl der Karten, die du auf der Hand halten darfst.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Una vez que hayas aprendido todas mis lecciones, te parecerá que el mundo entero se ha abierto a tu mente y nada está lejos de tu alcance."
—Señora Azami
foreignData.name: Perita agraciada
foreignData.text: Tu mano no tiene tamaño máximo.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Quand vous maîtriserez mes leçons, le monde entier s'ouvrira à vous et rien ne sera hors de votre portée. »
—Dame Azami
foreignData.name: Experte gracieuse
foreignData.text: Il n'y a pas de limite au nombre de cartes dans votre main.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Quando avrai appreso le mie lezioni, il mondo sembrerà sbocciare davanti alla tua mente e tutto sarà alla tua portata."
—Lady Azami
foreignData.name: Insegnante Gentile
foreignData.text: Non hai più il limite di carte nella mano.

foreignData.flavorText:
我が教えを身に着けたなら、世界がすべてあなたに心を開き、掴めぬ物は何も無きが如くに感じられましょう。
――あざみ
foreignData.name: 優雅な達人
foreignData.text: あなたの手札の上限はなくなる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText:
"Quando tiveres dominado minhas lições, terás a impressão de que o todo do mundo se abriu à tua mente e nada está além do teu alcance".
— Dama Azami
foreignData.name: Adepto Elegante
foreignData.text: Não há limite para o número máximo de cards em sua mão.

foreignData.flavorText:
「当你完全通达了这些学问，整个世界将为你开启，万物皆在掌握之中。」
～蓟夫人
foreignData.name: 优雅名师
foreignData.text: 你的手牌数量没有上限。

cards.name: Guardian of Solitude
cards.text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, target creature gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavorText:
"It seemed an easy thing, to step into the nothingness, to fall, to die. But then, for an instant, I saw it, eyes filled with endless sorrow, and I turned back to face my pain."
—Snow-Fur, kitsune poet

foreignData.flavorText:
„Es schien so einfach zu sein, ins Nichts zu schreiten, zu fallen, zu sterben. Doch dann sah ich es, Augen voller Sorge, und ich kehrte um, um meinem Schmerz entgegenzutreten."
—Schneepelz, Kitsune-Dichter
foreignData.name: Wächter der Einsamkeit
foreignData.text: Immer wenn du einen Geist oder einen arkanen Zauber spielst, erhält eine Kreatur deiner Wahl bis zum Ende des Zuges Flugfähigkeit.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Parecía sencillo dar el paso necesario hacia la nada, caer, morir. Pero allí, por un instante, vi sus ojos llenos de un sufrimiento infinito, y me di la vuelta dispuesto a hacer frente al dolor."
—Pelaje-nevado, poeta kitsune
foreignData.name: Guardián de la soledad
foreignData.text: Siempre que juegues un hechizo arcano o de Espíritu, la criatura objetivo gana la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Il me parût facile de me laisser avaler par le néant. Mais ce fut alors que je la vis, les yeux emplis d'une profonde tristesse, et je me retournai pour affronter ma peine. »
—Fourrure-de-neige, poète kitsune
foreignData.name: Vigile de solitude
foreignData.text: À chaque fois que vous jouez un sort d'arcane ou d'esprit, la créature ciblée acquiert le vol jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Sembrava facile cedere al nulla, cadere, morire. Ma poi, per un istante, lo vidi, gli occhi colmi di tristezza infinita, e mi voltai per affrontare il mio dolore."
—Pelo-di-Neve, poeta kitsune
foreignData.name: Guardiano della Solitudine
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta giochi una magia Spirito o Arcano, la creatura bersaglio guadagna volare fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText:
無に臨み、倒れ、死す事はたやすく思えたり。されどもその刹那、終りなき悲しみに沈む目を見、我は苦痛と戦うために帰りぬ。
――狐の詩人、雪毛
foreignData.name: 孤独の守護者
foreignData.text: あなたがスピリット呪文か秘儀呪文をプレイするたび、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはターン終了時まで飛行を持つ。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — スピリット

foreignData.flavorText:
"Parecia fácil entrar no nada, cair, morrer. Mas então, por um instante, eu os vi, olhos repletos de pesares sem fim, e voltei para encarar a minha dor".
— Pêlo de Neve, poeta kitsune
foreignData.name: Guardião do Isolamento
foreignData.text: Toda vez que você jogar uma mágica Arcana ou de Espírito, a criatura alvo ganha a habilidade de voar até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText:
「一切显得如此轻易：步入寂寥，坠落，死去；但那一瞬我见到它，与眼底的无尽哀伤。于是我回过头来，重新面对所经历的痛苦。」
～狐诗人雪毛
foreignData.name: 孤寂守卫
foreignData.text: 每当你使用精怪或古咒咒语时，目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

cards.name: Hinder
cards.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put that card on the top or bottom of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
cards.flavorText:
"Do not react to force in kind. Turn it aside. Direct it to where it can do no harm."
—Meloku the Clouded Mirror

rulings.text: Hinder's controller, not necessarily the controller of the countered spell, chooses where the countered spell goes.

foreignData.flavorText:
„Reagiere auf keine Art der Gewalt. Lasse sie abtropfen. Lenke sie dorthin, wo sie keinen Schaden anrichten kann."
—Meloku, der bewölkte Spiegel
foreignData.name: Hindern
foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl. Falls er auf diese Weise neutralisiert wird, lege die Karte auf oder unter die Bibliothek ihres Besitzers, anstatt sie auf den Friedhof dieses Spielers zu legen.

foreignData.flavorText:
"No reacciones a la violencia con violencia. Desvíala. Dirígela hacia donde no pueda hacer daño."
—Meloku el espejo nublado
foreignData.name: Obstaculizar
foreignData.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo. Si el hechizo se contrarresta de esta manera, pon esa carta en la parte superior o inferior de la biblioteca de su propietario en vez de en el cementerio de ese jugador.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Ne répondez pas à la force par la force. Redirigez-la où elle ne peut blesser personne. »
—Meloku le Miroir voilé
foreignData.name: Obstacle
foreignData.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé.S'il est contrecarré de cette manière, mettez cette carte au-dessus ou au-dessous de la bibliothèque de son propriétaire à la place du cimetière de ce joueur.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Non reagire alla forza con altra forza. Deviala. Dirigila dove sai che non farà alcun male."
—Meloku Specchio-Offuscato
foreignData.name: Intralciare
foreignData.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio. Se viene neutralizzata in questo modo, metti quella carta in cima o in fondo al grimorio del suo proprietario invece che nel cimitero di quel giocatore.

foreignData.flavorText:
力に力で返すべからず。脇に向ければよい。痛まぬ場所へ差し向ければいいのだ。
――曇り鏡のメロク
foreignData.name: 邪魔
foreignData.text: 呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。それがこれにより打ち消された場合、そのカードをオーナーの墓地に置く代わりに、そのプレイヤーのライブラリーの一番上か一番下に置く。

foreignData.flavorText:
"Não reaja à força com força. Deixe-a de lado. Direcione-a para onde ela é inofensiva".
— Meloku, o Espelho Enevoado
foreignData.name: Obstruir
foreignData.text: Anula a mágica alvo. Se ela for anulada desta maneira, coloque aquele card no topo ou no fundo do grimório de seu dono, em vez de colocá-lo no cemitério daquele jogador.

foreignData.flavorText:
「勿以横暴回敬强蛮；应将其导引至无害之处。」
～昙镜梅洛古
foreignData.name: 阻碍
foreignData.text: 反击目标咒语。若该咒语以此法被反击，则改为将之置于其拥有者的牌库顶或牌库底，而非置入其拥有者的坟墓场。

cards.name: Hisoka, Minamo Sensei
cards.text: {2}{U}, Discard a card: Counter target spell if it has the same mana value as the discarded card.
cards.flavorText: "By all rights we should have perished in the Kami War. Our perseverence is a tribute to mortal ingenuity. And perhaps a few forgotten secrets found in the nick of time."

foreignData.flavorText: „Eigentlich hätten wir im Kami-Krieg untergehen müssen. Unsere Standhaftigkeit ist ein Tribut an die Raffinesse der Sterblichen. Und vielleicht haben wir auch zum richtigen Zeitpunkt ein paar vergessene Geheimnisse entdeckt."
foreignData.name: Hisoka, Minamo-Sensei
foreignData.text: {2}{U}, wirf eine Karte ab: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl, falls er dieselben umgewandelten Manakosten wie die abgeworfene Karte hat.

foreignData.flavorText: "Bajo cualquier concepto, deberíamos haber muerto en la guerra con los kami. Nuestra perseverancia es un tributo a la ingenuidad humana. Y tal vez algunos secretos olvidados encontrados justo a tiempo."
foreignData.name: Hisoka, sensei de Minamo
foreignData.text: {2}{U}, descartar una carta: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo si tiene el mismo coste de maná convertido que la carta descartada.

foreignData.flavorText: « Nous aurions péri dans la Guerre des kami sans cette persévérance qui est nôtre. Elle est le symbole du génie humain... aidé par quelques secrets retrouvés au bon moment. »
foreignData.name: Hisoka, sensei de Minamo
foreignData.text: {2}{U}, Défaussez-vous d'une carte :Contrecarrez le sort ciblé s'il a le même coût converti de mana que la carte défaussée.

foreignData.flavorText: "A rigor di logica, saremmo dovuti perire nella Guerra dei Kami. La nostra perseveranza è un tributo all'ingegnosità dei mortali. E forse a qualche segreto perduto che è stato ritrovato all'ultimo momento."
foreignData.name: Hisoka, Sensei di Minamo
foreignData.text: {2}{U}, Scarta una carta: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio se ha lo stesso costo di mana convertito della carta scartata.

foreignData.flavorText: 我らは神の乱にて死すべきであったのかもしれぬ。我らの忍耐は死するべき者の才として捧げられたものだ。あとは、いよいよというときに忘れられた秘密を見い出したお陰であろう。
foreignData.name: 水面院の師範、密
foreignData.text: {2}{U}, カードを１枚捨てる：呪文１つを対象とする。それの点数で見たマナ・コストが捨てたカードのものと同じ場合、それを打ち消す。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText: "Por tudo o que é de direito deveríamos ter perecido na Guerra dos Kamis. Nossa perseverança é um tributo à engenhosidade dos mortais. E, talvez, a alguns segredos esquecidos encontrados no momento exato".
foreignData.name: Hisoka, Sensei de Minamo
foreignData.text: {2}{U}, Descarte um card: Anula a mágica alvo se ela tiver o mesmo custo de mana convertido do card descartado.

foreignData.flavorText: 「吾人本应在逆神之战中全数败亡。我们能存在至今，便是对生灵智慧的致敬。而一些遭人遗忘的秘密能在关键时刻发挥作用，也是功不可没。」
foreignData.name: 水面院密师范
foreignData.text: {2}{U}，弃一张牌：若目标咒语与所弃之牌的总法术力费用相同，则反击之。

cards.name: Hisoka's Defiance
cards.text: Counter target Spirit or Arcane spell.
cards.flavorText: "With every passing day, the kami shape our world to suit their will. I, for one, would not see them succeed."

foreignData.flavorText: „Mit jedem Tag, der vergeht, formen die Kami unsere Welt nach ihrem Willen. Ich selber würde sie dabei ungern erfolgreich wissen."
foreignData.name: Hisokas Widerstand
foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Geist oder arkanen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: "Cada día que pasa, los kami moldean el mundo a su voluntad. Yo no permitiré que lo logren."
foreignData.name: Desafío de Hisoka
foreignData.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo arcano o de Espíritu.

foreignData.flavorText: « Avec chaque jour qui passe, les kami façonnent notre monde à leur image. Je refuse de leur concéder la victoire. »
foreignData.name: Résistance d'Hisoka
foreignData.text: Contrecarrez le sort d'esprit ou d'arcane ciblé.

foreignData.flavorText: "Ogni giorno che passa, i kami trasformano il nostro mondo per adattarlo al proprio volere. Io, dal canto mio, farò di tutto per impedirlo."
foreignData.name: Sfida di Hisoka
foreignData.text: Neutralizza una magia Spirito o Arcano bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 過ぎし日々に、神は自分の意に沿うようこの世界を形作っている。我一人はその成功を望まず。
foreignData.name: 密の反抗
foreignData.text: スピリット呪文１つか秘儀呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。

foreignData.flavorText: "A cada dia que passa, os kamis moldam nosso mundo de acordo com sua vontade. Eu, de minha parte, não os assistiria obter sucesso".
foreignData.name: Desafio de Hisoka
foreignData.text: Anula a mágica alvo Arcana ou de Espírito.

foreignData.flavorText: 「日复一日，神明将吾辈世界依其欲改造。但，至少我自己，就不愿见此成真。」
foreignData.name: 密师范的反抗
foreignData.text: 反击目标精怪或古咒咒语。

cards.name: Hisoka's Guard
cards.text:
You may choose not to untap Hisoka's Guard during your untap step.
{1}{U}, {T}: Target creature you control other than Hisoka's Guard has shroud for as long as Hisoka's Guard remains tapped. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

foreignData.name: Hisokas Wache
foreignData.text:
Du kannst bestimmen, Hisokas Wache während deines Enttappsegments nicht zu enttappen.
{1}{U}, {T}: Solange Hisokas Wache getappt bleibt, kann eine Kreatur deiner Wahl außer Hisokas Wache nicht das Ziel von Zaubersprüchen oder Fähigkeiten sein.

foreignData.name: Guardia de Hisoka
foreignData.text:
Puedes elegir no enderezar el Guardia de Hisoka durante tu paso de enderezar.
{1}{U}, {T}: Mientras el Guardia de Hisoka permanezca girado, la criatura objetivo que controles distinta del Guardia de Hisoka no puede ser objetivo de hechizos o habilidades.

foreignData.name: Garde d'Hisoka
foreignData.text:
Vous pouvez choisir de ne pas dégager le Garde d'Hisoka pendant votre étape de dégagement.
{1}{U}, {T} : Tant que le Garde d'Hisoka est engagé, une créature ciblée que vous contrôlez autre que le Garde d'Hisoka ne peut pas être la cible de sorts ou de capacités.

foreignData.name: Guardia di Hisoka
foreignData.text:
Puoi scegliere di non STAPpare la Guardia di Hisoka durante il tuo STAP.
{1}{U}, {T}: Fintanto che la Guardia di Hisoka rimane TAPpata, una creatura bersaglio che controlli diversa dalla Guardia di Hisoka non può essere bersaglio di magie o abilità.

foreignData.name: 密の守護兵
foreignData.text:
あなたは密の守護兵を、あなたのアンタップ･ステップにアンタップしないことを選んでもよい。
{1}{U}, {T}：あなたがコントロールする、密の守護兵以外のクリーチャー１体を対象とする。密の守護兵がタップ状態であるかぎり、それは呪文や能力の対象にならない。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

foreignData.name: Guarda de Hisoka
foreignData.text:
Você pode optar por não desvirar Guarda de Hisoka durante sua etapa de desvirar.
{1}{U}, {T}: Enquanto Guarda de Hisoka permanecer virado, a criatura alvo que você controla que não seja Guarda de Hisoka não pode ser alvo de mágicas ou habilidades.

foreignData.name: 密师范护卫
foreignData.text:
你可选择于你的重置步骤中不重置密师范护卫。
{1}{U}，{T}：只要密师范护卫持续被横置，则目标由你操控，且不是密师范护卫的生物不能成为咒语或异能的目标。

cards.name: Honden of Seeing Winds
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card for each Shrine you control.
cards.flavorText: To the sorrow of all, its winds found sin in the hearts of those who once learned from its wisdom.

foreignData.flavorText: Zum Kummer aller fanden seine Winde Sünde in den Herzen derjenigen, die einst von seiner Weisheit gelernt hatten.
foreignData.name: Honden der Sehenden Winde
foreignData.text: Ziehe zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments für jeden Schrein, den du kontrollierst, eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: Lamentablemente para todos, sus vientos encontraron pecado en los corazones que una vez aprendieron de su sabiduría.
foreignData.name: Honden de los vientos atentos
foreignData.text: Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, roba una carta por cada Altar que controles.

foreignData.flavorText: À la grande tristesse de tous, son souffle découvrit le mal dans le cœur de ceux qui avaient appris de sa sagesse.
foreignData.name: Honden des Vents témoins
foreignData.text: Au début de votre entretien, piochez une carte pour chaque reliquaire que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.flavorText: Per la disperazione di tutti, i suoi venti trovarono il peccato nei cuori di coloro che un tempo imparavano dalla sua saggezza.
foreignData.name: Honden dei Venti Veggenti
foreignData.text: All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, pesca una carta per ogni Santuario che controlli.

foreignData.flavorText: すべての悲しみから、その風はかつて自分から知恵を学んだ者どもの心の中の罪を見つけた。
foreignData.name: 風見の本殿
foreignData.text: あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたがコントロールする祭殿１つにつきカードを１枚引く。
foreignData.type: 伝説のエンチャント（場） — 祭殿

foreignData.flavorText: Para o pesar de todos, seus ventos encontraram pecados nos corações dos que um dia aprenderam com sua sabedoria.
foreignData.name: Honden dos Ventos Observadores
foreignData.text: No início de sua manutenção, compre um card para cada Sacrário que você controla.

foreignData.flavorText: 最令人哀痛的，是其清风竟转而判罚过往的修众。
foreignData.name: 清风本殿
foreignData.text: 在你的维持开始时，你每操控一个祭祠，便抓一张牌。

cards.name: Jushi Apprentice // Tomoya the Revealer
cards.text: {2}{U}, {T}: Draw a card. If you have nine or more cards in hand, flip Jushi Apprentice.

cards.name: Jushi Apprentice // Tomoya the Revealer

cards.flavorText: Its form reflected humanity as it stood during the Kami War: disjointed, confused, and incomplete.

foreignData.flavorText: Seine Form entsprach der der Menschheit während des Kami-Krieges: zerstückelt, verwirrt und unvollständig.
foreignData.name: Kami des Zerrbilds
foreignData.text: Opfere den Kami des Zerrbilds: Bringe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.

foreignData.flavorText: Su forma refleja a la humanidad durante la guerra con los kami: fracturada, confusa e incompleta.

foreignData.text: Sacrificar el Kami del reflejo torcido: Regresa la criatura objetivo que controles a la mano de su propietario.

foreignData.flavorText: Sa forme reflétait l'humanité telle qu'elle était pendant la Guerre des kami : incohérente, troublée et incomplète.
foreignData.name: Kami du reflet perverti
foreignData.text: Sacrifiez le Kami du reflet perverti : Renvoyez la créature ciblée que vous contrôlez dans la main de son propriétaire.

foreignData.flavorText: La sua forma rifletteva le condizioni dell'umanità durante la Guerra dei Kami: incoerente, confusa e incompleta.
foreignData.name: Kami del Riflesso Distorto
foreignData.text: Sacrifica il Kami del Riflesso Distorto: Il proprietario riprende in mano una creatura bersaglio che tu controlli.

foreignData.flavorText: その姿は神の乱の最中の人間を映したものだ。それは支離滅裂で、混乱し、未完成だ。
foreignData.name: ねじれた鏡映の神
foreignData.text: ねじれた鏡映の神を生け贄に捧げる：あなたがコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — スピリット

foreignData.flavorText: Sua forma refletia o estado da humanidade durante a Guerra dos Kamis: desconjuntada, confusa e incompleta.

foreignData.text: Sacrifique Kami do Reflexo Distorcido: Devolve a criatura alvo que você controla para a mão de seu dono.

foreignData.flavorText: 其外型正反映了逆神之战时的人性：散乱，困惑，无主。
foreignData.name: 曲映神
foreignData.text: 牺牲曲映神：将目标由你操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。

cards.name: Lifted by Clouds
cards.text:
Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Splice onto Arcane {1}{U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

rulings.text: You reveal all cards you intend to splice at the same time. Each individual card can be spliced only once onto any one spell.
A card with a splice ability can’t be spliced onto itself because the spell is on the stack (and not in your hand) when you reveal the cards you want to splice onto it.

You choose all targets for the spell after revealing cards you want to splice, including any targets required by the text of any of those cards. You may choose a different target for each instance of the word “target” on the resulting spell.
If all of the spell’s targets are illegal when the spell tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen.

foreignData.name: Von Wolken emporgehoben
foreignData.text:
Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält Flugfähigkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges.
Arkane Kopplung {1}{U} (Sowie du einen arkanen Zauberspruch spielst, kannst du diese Karte aus deiner Hand vorzeigen und ihre Kopplungskosten bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, füge dem Zauberspruch den Effekt dieser Karte hinzu.)

foreignData.name: Elevado por nubes
foreignData.text:
La criatura objetivo gana la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno.
Empalmar con lo arcano {1}{U} (En cuanto juegues un hechizo arcano, puedes mostrar esta carta de tu mano y pagar su coste de empalme. Si lo haces, agrega los efectos de esta carta a ese hechizo.)

foreignData.name: Soulevé par les nuages
foreignData.text:
La créature ciblée acquiert le vol jusqu'à la fin du tour.
Imprégnation d'arcane {1}{U} (Au moment où vous jouez un sort d'arcane, vous pouvez révéler cette carte depuis votre main et payer son coût d'imprégnation. Si vous le faites, ajoutez les effets de cette carte à ce sort.)

foreignData.name: Sollevato dalle Nuvole
foreignData.text:
La creatura bersaglio guadagna volare fino alla fine del turno.
Unire nell'Arcano {1}{U} (Mentre giochi una magia Arcano, puoi rivelare questa carta dalla tua mano e pagare il suo costo di unione. Se lo fai, aggiungi l'effetto di questa carta a quella magia.)

foreignData.name: 雲の上昇
foreignData.text:
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはターン終了時まで飛行を得る。
連繋（秘儀） {1}{U} （あなたが秘儀呪文をプレイするに際し、あなたはこのカードを手札から公開して連繋コストを支払ってもよい。そうした場合、このカードの効果をその呪文に追加する。）
foreignData.type: インスタント — 秘儀

foreignData.name: Erguido por Nuvens
foreignData.text:
A criatura alvo ganha a habilidade de voar até o final do turno.
Unir em Arcana {1}{U} (Conforme joga uma mágica Arcana, você pode revelar este card de sua mão e pagar o seu custo de união. Se o fizer, adicione os efeitos deste card àquela mágica.)

foreignData.name: 腾云驾雾
foreignData.text:
目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。
通联古咒{1}{U}（于你使用古咒咒语时，你可以从你的手上展示此牌，并支付其通联费用。若你如此作，则将此牌的效应加入该咒语中。）

cards.name: Meloku the Clouded Mirror
cards.text:
Flying
{1}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Create a 1/1 blue Illusion creature token with flying.
cards.flavorText: He loved his cities in the clouds. When he traveled to the lands below, he brought many reminders of his home.

foreignData.flavorText: Er liebte seine Städte im Himmel. Wenn er in die Länder am Boden reisen musste, nahm er immer viele Erinnerungen an seine Heimat mit.
foreignData.name: Meloku, der bewölkte Spiegel
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
{1}, bringe ein Land, das du kontrollierst, auf die Hand seines Besitzers zurück: Bringe einen 1/1 blauen Illusions-Spielstein mit Flugfähigkeit ins Spiel.

foreignData.flavorText: Amaba tanto a sus ciudades en las nubes que siempre que viajaba por las tierras bajo ellas, llevaba consigo recuerdos de su hogar.
foreignData.name: Meloku el espejo nublado
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
{1}, regresar una tierra que controles a la mano de su propietario: Pon en juego una ficha de criatura Ilusión azul 1/1 con la habilidad de volar.

foreignData.flavorText: Il aimait ses cités dans les nuages. Quand il voyageait dans les terres du dessous, il apportait avec lui ses souvenirs de chez lui.
foreignData.name: Meloku le Miroir voilé
foreignData.text:
Vol
{1}, Renvoyez un terrain que vous contrôlez dans la main de son propriétaire : Mettez en jeu un jeton de créature 1/1 bleue Illusion avec le vol.

foreignData.flavorText: Amava le sue città tra le nuvole. Quando viaggiava nelle terre sottostanti, portava sempre con sé molti ricordi della propria casa.
foreignData.name: Meloku Specchio-Offuscato
foreignData.text:
Volare
{1}, Il proprietario riprende in mano una terra che tu controlli: Metti in gioco una pedina creatura Illusione 1/1 blu con volare.

foreignData.flavorText: 彼は雲の中の都市を愛している。彼が眼下の地へ旅する時は、その地に多くの故郷の名残を多く残していった。
foreignData.name: 曇り鏡のメロク
foreignData.text:
飛行
{1}, あなたがコントロールする土地を１枚、オーナーの手札に戻す：青の飛行を持つ１/１のイリュージョン・クリーチャー・トークンを１体場に出す。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — ムーンフォーク・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText: Ele amava suas cidades nas nuvens. Quando viajava para as terras abaixo, ele levava muitas lembranças de seu lar.
foreignData.name: Meloku, o Espelho Enevoado
foreignData.text:
Voar
{1}, Devolva um terreno que você controla para a mão de seu dono: Coloque em jogo uma ficha de criatura azul 1/1, com a habilidade de voar, do tipo Ilusão.

foreignData.flavorText: 他钟爱自己的云端城市。每次出发至地面旅行，都随身带着许多家乡物品。
foreignData.name: 昙镜梅洛古
foreignData.text:
飞行
{1}，将由你操控的一个地移回其拥有者手上：将一个1/1蓝色，具有飞行异能的虚影衍生物放置进场。

cards.name: Myojin of Seeing Winds
cards.text:
Myojin of Seeing Winds enters the battlefield with a divinity counter on it if you cast it from your hand.
Myojin of Seeing Winds has indestructible as long as it has a divinity counter on it.
Remove a divinity counter from Myojin of Seeing Winds: Draw a card for each permanent you control.

rulings.text: In a Commander game where this card is your commander, casting it from the Command zone does not count as casting it from your hand.

foreignData.name: Myojin der Sehenden Winde
foreignData.text:
Der Myojin der Sehenden Winde kommt mit einer Göttlichkeitsmarke ins Spiel, falls du ihn aus deiner Hand gespielt hast.
Solange auf dem Myojin der Sehenden Winde eine Göttlichkeitsmarke liegt, ist er unzerstörbar.
Entferne eine Göttlichkeitsmarke vom Myojin der Sehenden Winde: Ziehe eine Karte für jede bleibende Karte, die du kontrollierst.

foreignData.name: Myojin de los vientos atentos
foreignData.text:
El Myojin de los vientos atentos entra en juego con un contador de divinidad si lo jugaste de tu mano.
El Myojin de los vientos atentos es indestructible mientras tenga un contador de divinidad sobre él.
Remover un contador de divinidad del Myojin de los vientos atentos: Roba una carta por cada permanente que controles.

foreignData.name: Myojin des Vents témoins
foreignData.text:
Le Myojin des Vents témoins arrive en jeu avec sur lui un marqueur « divinité » si vous l'avez joué depuis votre main.
Le Myojin des Vents témoins est indestructible tant qu'il a sur lui un marqueur « divinité ».
Retirez un marqueur « divinité » du Myojin des Vents témoins : Piochez une carte pour chaque permanent que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.name: Myojin dei Venti Veggenti
foreignData.text:
Il Myojin dei Venti Veggenti entra in gioco con un segnalino divinità se lo giochi dalla tua mano.
Il Myojin dei Venti Veggenti è indistruttibile fintanto che ha almeno un segnalino divinità.
Rimuovi un segnalino divinità dal Myojin dei Venti Veggenti: Pesca una carta per ogni permanente che controlli.

foreignData.name: 風見明神
foreignData.text:
風見明神は、それがあなたの手札からプレイされた場合、上に神性カウンターを１個置いた状態で場に出る。
風見明神の上に神性カウンターが置かれているかぎり、それは破壊されない。
風見明神の上から神性カウンターを１個取り除く：あなたがコントロールするパーマネント１つにつき、カードを１枚引く。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — スピリット

foreignData.name: Myojin dos Ventos Observadores
foreignData.text:
Myojin dos Ventos Observadores entra em jogo com um marcador de divindade se você o tiver jogado de sua mão.
Myojin dos Ventos Observadores é indestrutível enquanto tiver um marcador de divindade.
Remova um marcador de divindade de Myojin dos Ventos Observadores: Compre um card para cada permanente que você controla.

foreignData.name: 清风明神
foreignData.text:
清风明神进场时，若你从手上使用之，则其上有一个神威指示物。
只要清风明神上面有神威指示物，便不会毁坏。
从清风明神上移去一个神威指示物：你每操控一个永久物，便抓一张牌。

cards.name: Mystic Restraints
cards.text:
Flash
Enchant creature
When Mystic Restraints enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

foreignData.name: Mystische Beschränkungen
foreignData.text:
Du kannst die Mystischen Beschränkungen immer dann spielen, falls du auch einen Spontanzauber spielen könntest.
Wenn die Mystischen Beschränkungen ins Spiel kommen, tappe die verzauberte Kreatur.
Die verzauberte Kreatur enttappt nicht während des Enttappsegments ihres Beherrschers.

foreignData.name: Restricción mística
foreignData.text:
Puedes jugar la Restricción mística en cualquier momento en que pudieras jugar un instantáneo.
Cuando la Restricción mística entre en juego, gira la criatura encantada.
La criatura encantada no se endereza durante el paso de enderezar de su controlador.

foreignData.name: Restrictions mystiques
foreignData.text:
Vous pouvez jouer les Restrictions mystiques à tout moment où vous pourriez jouer un éphémère.
Quand les Restrictions mystiques arrivent en jeu, engagez la créature enchantée.
La créature enchantée ne se dégage pas pendant l'étape de dégagement de son contrôleur.

foreignData.name: Lacci Mistici
foreignData.text:
Puoi giocare i Lacci Mistici in qualsiasi momento in cui potresti giocare un istantaneo.
Quando i Lacci Mistici entrano in gioco, TAPpa la creatura incantata.
La creatura incantata non STAPpa durante lo STAP del proprio controllore.

foreignData.name: 秘教の抑制
foreignData.text:
あなたは秘教の抑制を、あなたがインスタントをプレイできるときならいつでもプレイしてよい。
秘教の抑制が場に出たとき、エンチャントされているクリーチャーをタップする。
エンチャントされているクリーチャーは、それのコントローラーのアンタップ･ステップにアンタップしない。
foreignData.type: エンチャント（クリーチャー）

foreignData.name: Restrições Místicas
foreignData.text:
Você pode jogar Restrições Místicas a qualquer momento em que puder jogar uma mágica instantânea.
Quando Restrições Místicas entra em jogo, vira a criatura encantada.
A criatura encantada não desvira durante a etapa de desvirar de seu controlador.

foreignData.name: 神秘管押
foreignData.text:
你可以于你能够使用瞬间的时机下，使用神秘管押。
当神秘管押进场时，横置受此结界的生物。
受此结界的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

cards.name: Part the Veil
cards.text: Return all creatures you control to their owner's hand.
cards.flavorText: At the waterfall, the border between the humanoid and the spirit worlds was weakest. The kami moved across it with ease and at will.

foreignData.flavorText: Am Wasserfall war die Grenze zwischen der menschlichen und der Geisterwelt am schwächsten. Die Kami überquerten sie ohne Anstrengung und nach Belieben.
foreignData.name: Den Schleier teilen
foreignData.text: Bringe alle Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück.

foreignData.flavorText: En la cascada, la frontera entre los mundos espiritual y material es más débil. Los kami la cruzaron a voluntad sin problemas.
foreignData.name: Correr el velo
foreignData.text: Regresa todas las criaturas que controles a la mano de su propietario.

foreignData.flavorText: La frontière entre les mondes humanoïde et spirituel était la plus faible au niveau de la cascade. Les kami la traversaient à leur gré.
foreignData.name: Ouvrir le voile
foreignData.text: Renvoyez toutes les créatures que vous contrôlez dans la main de leur propriétaire.

foreignData.flavorText: Alla cascata, il confine tra il mondo degli umanoidi e quello degli spiriti era particolarmente debole. I kami lo attraversavano liberamente.
foreignData.name: Aprire il Velo
foreignData.text: I proprietari riprendono in mano tutte le creature che tu controlli.

foreignData.flavorText: 滝のある所、人類と精霊の世界の境は最も薄い。神はそこをたやすく意のままに乗り越えてくる。
foreignData.name: 帷の切断
foreignData.text: あなたがコントロールするすべてのクリーチャーをオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignData.type: インスタント — 秘儀

foreignData.flavorText: Na cascata, a fronteira entre o mundo dos humanóides e o dos espíritos era mais fraca. Os kamis passavam por ela facilmente e à vontade.
foreignData.name: Repartir o Véu
foreignData.text: Devolve todas as criaturas que você controla para a mão de seu dono.

foreignData.flavorText: 实界与灵界的分野最薄之处就是瀑布，神明可轻易穿梭两界。
foreignData.name: 分开水帘
foreignData.text: 将所有由你操控的生物移回其拥有者的手上。

cards.name: Peer Through Depths
cards.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

rulings.text: If you don’t reveal an instant or sorcery card, put all the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

foreignData.name: Durch Tiefen spähen
foreignData.text: Schau dir die obersten fünf Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst eine Spontanzauber- oder Hexereikarte darunter offen vorzeigen und auf deine Hand nehmen. Lege den Rest der Karten in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.

foreignData.name: Indagar en las profundidades
foreignData.text: Mira las primeras cinco cartas de la parte superior de tu biblioteca. Puedes mostrar una carta de instantáneo o de conjuro que se encuentre entre ellas y ponerla en tu mano. Pon el resto en la parte inferior de tu biblioteca en cualquier orden.

foreignData.name: Sonder les profondeurs
foreignData.text: Regardez les cinq cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez révéler une carte d'éphémère ou de rituel parmi elles et la mettre dans votre main. Mettez les autres au-dessous de votre bibliothèque, dans n'importe quel ordre.

foreignData.name: Scrutare nelle Profondità
foreignData.text: Guarda le prime cinque carte del tuo grimorio. Puoi rivelare una carta istantaneo o stregoneria fra esse e aggiungerla alla tua mano. Metti le rimanenti in fondo al tuo grimorio nell'ordine che preferisci.

foreignData.name: 深遠の覗き見
foreignData.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上から５枚のカードを見る。あなたはその中のソーサリー・カード１枚かインスタント・カード１枚を公開して自分の手札に加えてもよい。残りのカードはあなたのライブラリーの一番下に望む順番で置く。
foreignData.type: インスタント — 秘儀

foreignData.name: Examinar as Profundezas
foreignData.text: Olhe os cinco cards do topo de seu grimório. Você pode revelar um card de feitiço ou de mágica instantânea dentre eles e colocá-lo em sua mão. Coloque o resto no fundo de seu grimório em qualquer ordem.

foreignData.name: 寻遍深水
foreignData.text: 检视你牌库顶的五张牌。你可以展示其中的一张瞬间或法术牌，并将其置于你手上。将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

cards.name: Petals of Insight
cards.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may put those cards on the bottom of your library in any order. If you do, return Petals of Insight to its owner's hand. Otherwise, draw three cards.

rulings.text: If you choose to put the three cards on the bottom of your library, Petals of Insight will return to your hand directly from the stack. It never goes to a graveyard.

foreignData.name: Blütenblätter der Einsicht
foreignData.text: Schau dir die obersten drei Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst diese Karten in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek legen. Falls du dies tust, bringe die Blütenblätter der Einsicht auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück. Ziehe sonst drei Karten.

foreignData.name: Pétalos de la perspicacia
foreignData.text: Mira las primeras tres cartas de la parte superior de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner esas cartas en la parte inferior de tu biblioteca en cualquier orden. Si lo haces, regresa los Pétalos de la perspicacia a la mano de su propietario. De lo contrario, roba tres cartas.

foreignData.name: Pétales de perspicacité
foreignData.text: Regardez les trois cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez mettre ces cartes au-dessous de votre bibliothèque dans n'importe quel ordre. Si vous faites ainsi, renvoyez les Pétales de perspicacité dans la main de leur propriétaire. Sinon, piochez trois cartes.

foreignData.name: Petali della Perspicacia
foreignData.text: Guarda le prime tre carte del tuo grimorio. Puoi mettere quelle carte in fondo al tuo grimorio nell'ordine che preferisci. Se lo fai, il proprietario riprende in mano i Petali della Perspicacia. Altrimenti, pesca tre carte.

foreignData.name: 洞察力の花弁
foreignData.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上から３枚のカードを見る。あなたはそれらのカードを、あなたのライブラリーの一番下に望む順番で置いてもよい。そうした場合、洞察力の花弁をオーナーの手札に戻す。そうしない場合、カードを３枚引く。

foreignData.name: Pétalas de Introvisão
foreignData.text: Olhe os três cards do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocá-los no fundo de seu grimório em qualquer ordem. Se o fizer, devolva Pétalas de Introvisão para a mão de seu dono. Caso contrário, compre três cards.

foreignData.name: 洞察花瓣
foreignData.text: 检视你牌库顶的三张牌。你可以将这些牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。若你如此作，将洞察花瓣移回其拥有者手上。若你不如此作，则抓三张牌。

cards.name: Reach Through Mists
cards.text: Draw a card.
cards.flavorText:
"Know one part of the name, obsession begins. Know two parts, paranoia sets in. Know three parts, madness descends. Know all, and only the kami know what will become of you."
—Lady Azami

foreignData.flavorText:
„Kennst du einen Teil des Namens, beginnt die Versessenheit. Kennst du zwei Teile, folgt Verfolgungswahn. Kennst du drei Teile, setzt Wahnsinn ein. Kennst du sie alle, wissen nur die Kami, was aus dir wird."
—Herrin Azami
foreignData.name: Durch Nebel greifen
foreignData.text: Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Conoces una parte del nombre, comienza la obsesión. Conoces dos partes, crece la paranoia. Conoces tres partes, se afianza la locura. Lo conoces todo, y sólo los kami saben qué será de ti."
—Señora Azami
foreignData.name: Buscar entre la niebla
foreignData.text: Roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Connaître une partie du nom, c'est l'obsession. Deux parties, c'est la paranoïa. Trois, et c'est la folie qui vous enveloppe. Apprenez-le en entier, et seuls les kami sauront ce qu'il adviendra de vous. »
—Dame Azami
foreignData.name: Sonder les brumes

cards.name: Reweave
cards.text:
Target permanent's controller sacrifices it. If the player does, they reveal cards from the top of their library until they reveal a permanent card that shares a card type with the sacrificed permanent, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
Splice onto Arcane {2}{U}{U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

rulings.text: When Reweave resolves it uses the type(s) that the permanent had right before it was sacrificed.
The player reveals cards only if the targeted permanent gets sacrificed.

With the introduction of the Tribal type it became possible for an instant or sorcery card to share a type with the sacrificed permanent (ie, a Tribal instant card shares a type with a Tribal Enchantment card). Reweave has received errata so that the effect looks for a *permanent* card that shares a type with the sacrificed permanent. A permanent card is a card that could be put onto the battlefield, which is any card that isn’t an instant or sorcery.
You reveal all cards you intend to splice at the same time. Each individual card can be spliced only once onto any one spell.
A card with a splice ability can’t be spliced onto itself because the spell is on the stack (and not in your hand) when you reveal the cards you want to splice onto it.

You choose all targets for the spell after revealing cards you want to splice, including any targets required by the text of any of those cards. You may choose a different target for each instance of the word “target” on the resulting spell.
If all of the spell’s targets are illegal when the spell tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen.

cards.name: Time Stop
cards.text: End the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities from the stack, including this card. The player whose turn it is discards down to their maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)

rulings.text: Exiling a spell or ability prevents that spell or ability from resolving, but it doesn’t technically “counter” anything. This means that Time Stop can exile spells and abilities that “can’t be countered.”

Unless Time Stop is cast during the Ending phase, any “at the beginning of the end step”-triggered abilities don’t get the chance to trigger on the turn Time Stop is cast. These abilities will trigger at the beginning of the next end step.

Ending the turn this way means the following things happen in order: 1) All spells and abilities on the stack are exiled. This includes Time Stop, though it will continue to resolve. It also includes spells and abilities that can’t be countered. 2) All attacking and blocking creatures are removed from combat. 3) State-based actions are checked. No player gets priority, and no triggered abilities are put onto the stack. 4) The current phase and/or step ends. The game skips straight to the cleanup step. The cleanup step happens in its entirety.

If any triggered abilities do trigger during this process, they’re put onto the stack during the cleanup step. If this happens, players will have a chance to cast spells and activate abilities, then there will be another cleanup step before the turn finally ends.

Schaden wird abgetragen, und „in diesem Zug"- und „bis zum Ende des Zuges"-Effekte enden.)

cards.name: Hideous Laughter
cards.text:
All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
Splice onto Arcane {3}{B}{B} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

rulings.text: You reveal all cards you intend to splice at the same time. Each individual card can be spliced only once onto any one spell.
A card with a splice ability can’t be spliced onto itself because the spell is on the stack (and not in your hand) when you reveal the cards you want to splice onto it.

You choose all targets for the spell after revealing cards you want to splice, including any targets required by the text of any of those cards. You may choose a different target for each instance of the word “target” on the resulting spell.
If all of the spell’s targets are illegal when the spell tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen.

cards.name: Soulless Revival
cards.text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Splice onto Arcane {1}{B} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

rulings.text: You reveal all cards you intend to splice at the same time. Each individual card can be spliced only once onto any one spell.
A card with a splice ability can’t be spliced onto itself because the spell is on the stack (and not in your hand) when you reveal the cards you want to splice onto it.

You choose all targets for the spell after revealing cards you want to splice, including any targets required by the text of any of those cards. You may choose a different target for each instance of the word “target” on the resulting spell.
If all of the spell’s targets are illegal when the spell tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen.

cards.name: Struggle for Sanity
cards.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. That player exiles a card from it, then you exile a card from it. Repeat this process until all cards in that hand have been exiled. That player returns the cards they exiled this way to their hand and puts the rest into their graveyard.

foreignData.name: Ringen um Verstand
foreignData.text: Ein Gegner deiner Wahl zeigt die Karten auf seiner Hand offen vor. Dieser Spieler legt eine Karte davon beiseite, dann legst du eine Karte davon beiseite. Wiederholt diesen Prozess, bis alle diese Karten beiseite gelegt wurden. Dieser Spieler nimmt dann die Karten, die er beiseite gelegt hat, auf seine Hand und legt den Rest auf seinen Friedhof.

foreignData.name: Lucha por la cordura
foreignData.text: El oponente objetivo muestra su mano. Ese jugador separa una carta de ahí; luego tú haces lo mismo. Repite este proceso hasta que se hayan separado todas las cartas de esa mano. Ese jugador regresa las cartas que separó a su mano y pone el resto en su cementerio.

foreignData.name: Lutte contre la démence
foreignData.text: L'adversaire ciblé révèle sa main. Ce joueur y prend une carte qu'il met de côté, et vous y prenez ensuite une carte que vous mettez de côté. Continuez ainsi jusqu'à ce que toutes les cartes de cette main aient été mises de côté. Ce joueur renvoie dans sa main les cartes qu'il a mises de côté et met les autres dans son cimetière.

foreignData.name: Lotta per l'Equilibrio
foreignData.text: L'avversario bersaglio rivela la propria mano. Quel giocatore mette da parte una carta dalla propria mano, quindi tu metti da parte una carta da essa. Ripetete il procedimento finché tutte le carte di quella mano sono state messe da parte. Quel giocatore riprende in mano le carte che aveva messo da parte e mette le rimanenti nel proprio cimitero.

foreignData.name: 正気への葛藤
foreignData.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは手札を公開する。そのプレイヤーはその中のカード１枚を脇に置き、その後あなたがその中のカード１枚を脇に置く。この手順を、その手札のカードがすべて脇に置かれるまで繰り返す。そのプレイヤーは、自分が脇に置いたカードをすべて自分の手札に戻し、残りを自分の墓地に置く。

foreignData.name: Luta pela Sanidade
foreignData.text: O oponente alvo revela sua própria mão. Aquele jogador separa um card dela, e depois você faz o mesmo. Repita este processo até que todos os cards da mão dele tenham sido separados. Aquele jogador devolve para sua própria mão todos os cards que ele próprio separou e coloca o resto em seu cemitério.

foreignData.name: 精神搏斗

cards.name: Desperate Ritual
cards.text:
Add {R}{R}{R}.
Splice onto Arcane {1}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

rulings.text: You reveal all cards you intend to splice at the same time. Each individual card can be spliced only once onto any one spell.
A card with a splice ability can’t be spliced onto itself because the spell is on the stack (and not in your hand) when you reveal the cards you want to splice onto it.

You choose all targets for the spell after revealing cards you want to splice, including any targets required by the text of any of those cards. You may choose a different target for each instance of the word “target” on the resulting spell.
If all of the spell’s targets are illegal when the spell tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen.
Desperate Ritual isn’t a mana ability. When cast, it (or the spell it’s spliced onto) goes on the stack like any spell and can be responded to.

cards.name: Glacial Ray
cards.text:
Glacial Ray deals 2 damage to any target.
Splice onto Arcane {1}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

rulings.text: You reveal all cards you intend to splice at the same time. Each individual card can be spliced only once onto any one spell.
A card with a splice ability can’t be spliced onto itself because the spell is on the stack (and not in your hand) when you reveal the cards you want to splice onto it.

You choose all targets for the spell after revealing cards you want to splice, including any targets required by the text of any of those cards. You may choose a different target for each instance of the word “target” on the resulting spell.
If all of the spell’s targets are illegal when the spell tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen.

cards.name: Godo, Bandit Warlord

rulings.text: Unlike many effects that grant additional combat phases, you don't get an additional main phase with Godo, Bandit Warlord's ability. The additional combat phase happens immediately after the first combat phase.

cards.name: Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker
cards.text:
Haste
{T}: Create a token that's a copy of target nonlegendary creature you control, except it has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

rulings.text: The token copies exactly what was printed on the original creature (except that the copy also has haste) and nothing else (unless it’s copying a creature that’s a token or that’s copying something else; see below). It doesn’t copy whether the creature is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and/or Equipment attached to it, or any non-copy effects that changed its power, toughness, types, color, and so on. Most notably, if the target creature isn’t normally a creature, the copy won’t be a creature.
If the copied creature has {X} in its mana cost, X is 0.
If a copied creature is copying something else, the token you create will use the copiable values of the target creature. In most cases, it will just be a copy of whatever that creature is copying.
If a copied creature is a token that isn’t a copy of something else, the copy copies the original characteristics of that token as stated by the effect that created it.

Any enters-the-battlefield abilities of the copied creature will trigger when the token enters the battlefield. Any “as [this permanent] enters the battlefield” or “[this permanent] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the copied creature card will also work.

If another creature becomes a copy of, or enters the battlefield as a copy of, the token, that creature will copy the creature card the token is copying, except it will also have haste. However, you won’t sacrifice the new copy at the beginning of the next end step.
If Kiki-Jiki’s ability creates multiple tokens due to a replacement effect (such as the one Doubling Season creates), you’ll sacrifice each of them.

cards.name: Lava Spike
cards.text: Lava Spike deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
cards.flavorText: Some kami attacks during the war were rife with trickery, subterfuge, and subtlety, draining hope and pride from the mortal world. Other attacks were a lot more straightforward.

rulings.text: Arcane is a spell subtype that has no inherent rules meaning. It may be referenced by effects from other cards.

foreignData.flavorText: Manche Angriffe der Kami während des Krieges waren trickreich, hintersinnig und spitzfindig und entzogen der Welt der Sterblichen Hoffnung und Stolz. Andere Angriffe gingen gleich aufs Ganze.
foreignData.name: Lavastachel
foreignData.text: Der Lavastachel fügt einem Spieler deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignData.flavorText: Algunos ataques de los kami durante la guerra estuvieron llenos de trucos, subterfugio, artimañas y sutileza, absorbiendo la esperanza del mundo mortal. Otros ataques fueron mucho más directos.
foreignData.name: Descarga de lava
foreignData.text: La Descarga de lava hace 3 puntos de daño al jugador objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: Certains kami utilisaient la ruse, le subterfuge et la subtilité pour détruire l'espoir et la fierté du monde des mortels. D'autres étaient bien plus directs.
foreignData.name: Pointe de Lave
foreignData.text: La Pointe de lave inflige 3 blessures au joueur ciblé.

foreignData.flavorText: Alcuni attacchi dei kami durante la guerra erano impregnati di inganno, sotterfugi e tradimento e sottrassero la speranza e l'orgoglio al mondo mortale. Altri attacchi, invece, furono molto più diretti.
foreignData.name: Getto di Lava
foreignData.text: Il Getto di Lava infligge 3 danni a un giocatore bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 神は時には、狡猾さや手練手管で生きるものの世界から希望と誇りを奪い去った。それ以外は、もっと単純明快だった。
foreignData.name: 溶岩の撃ち込み
foreignData.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。溶岩の撃ち込みはそのプレイヤーに３点のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText: Alguns dos ataques dos kamis durante a guerra baseavam-se em muita trapaça, subterfúrgio e sutileza, que drenavam a esperança e o orgulho do mundo mortal. Os outros eram muito mais diretos.
foreignData.name: Espículo de Lava
foreignData.text: Espículo de Lava causa 3 pontos de dano ao jogador alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: 在战时，一些神明专长用诈术，遁辞，以及狡猾来分化民心、侵蚀战意。其他神明的攻击则简洁得多。
foreignData.name: 熔岩击
foreignData.text: 熔岩击对目标牌手造成3点伤害。

cards.name: Mana Seism
cards.text: Sacrifice any number of lands, then add that much {C}.
cards.flavorText:
"It is the nature of humanity not to worry about tomorrow, especially when there's a good chance they won't live to see the end of today."
—Kiku, Night's Flower

foreignData.flavorText:
„Es liegt in der Natur der Menschheit, sich keine Gedanken über das Morgen zu machen, besonders, wenn eine gute Chance besteht, dass sie noch nicht mal das Ende des Heute erleben werden."
—Kiku, Blume der Nacht
foreignData.name: Manabeben

foreignData.flavorText:

foreignData.flavorText:

foreignData.flavorText:
"È nella natura degli umani non preoccuparsi del domani, soprattutto quando c'è una forte probabilità che non si sopravviva abbastanza a lungo da vedere la fine del giorno."
—Kiku, Fiore della Notte
foreignData.name: Sisma di Mana

foreignData.flavorText:
人間たるもの、明日を気にせぬが自然。ましてや今日を生き抜けるかどうかもわからぬなれば。
――夜の華、切苦
foreignData.name: マナの地鳴り

foreignData.flavorText:

— Kiku, Flor da Noite

～幽菊切苦

cards.name: Mindblaze
cards.text: Choose a nonland card name and a number greater than 0. Target player reveals their library. If that library contains exactly the chosen number of cards with the chosen name, Mindblaze deals 8 damage to that player. Then that player shuffles.

foreignData.name: Hirnglut
foreignData.text: Benenne eine Karte, die kein Land ist, und bestimme eine Anzahl größer als 0. Ein Spieler deiner Wahl zeigt die Karten in seiner Bibliothek offen vor. Falls diese Bibliothek genau die bestimmte Anzahl der bestimmten Karte enthält, fügt Hirnglut diesem Spieler 8 Schadenspunkte zu. Dieser Spieler mischt dann seine Bibliothek.

foreignData.name: Llamarada mental
foreignData.text: Nombra una carta que no sea tierra y elige un número mayor que 0. El jugador objetivo muestra su biblioteca. Si esa biblioteca contiene exactamente la cantidad elegida de la carta nombrada, la Llamarada mental hace 8 puntos de daño a ese jugador. Luego ese jugador baraja su biblioteca.

foreignData.name: Brasier cérébral
foreignData.text: Nommez une carte non-terrain et choisissez un nombre supérieur à 0. Le joueur ciblé révèle sa bibliothèque. Si elle contient exactement le nombre choisi de la carte nommée, le Brasier cérébral inflige 8 blessures à ce joueur. Ce joueur mélange ensuite sa bibliothèque.

foreignData.name: Bruciamente
foreignData.text: Nomina una carta non terra e scegli un numero superiore a 0. Il giocatore bersaglio rivela il proprio grimorio. Se quel grimorio contiene esattamente il numero di copie indicato della carta nominata, il Bruciamente infligge 8 danni a quel giocatore. Poi quel giocatore rimescola il proprio grimorio.

foreignData.name: 思考の猛火
foreignData.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。あなたは土地で無いカード名を１つと、１以上の数を１つ指定する。そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーを公開する。そのライブラリーに指定された名前のカードが指定した数ちょうどあった場合、思考の猛火はそのプレイヤーに８点のダメージを与える。その後、そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーを切り直す。

foreignData.name: Labareda Mental
foreignData.text: Nomeie um card que não seja um terreno e escolha um número maior do que 0. O jogador alvo revela seu próprio grimório. Se o grimório contiver a quantidade exata do card nomeado, Labareda Mental causa 8 pontos de dano àquele jogador. Depois, aquele jogador embaralha o seu próprio grimório.

foreignData.name: 火热思绪
foreignData.text: 说出一个非地的牌之名称，以及一个大于0的数字。目标牌手展示其牌库。若该牌库中该名称的牌正好是所说的数量，火热思绪对该牌手造成8点伤害。然后该牌手将其牌库洗牌。

cards.name: Strange Inversion
cards.text:
Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
Splice onto Arcane {1}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

rulings.text: Effects that switch power and toughness apply after all other effects that change power and/or toughness, regardless of which effect was created first.
Switching a creature’s power and toughness twice (or any even number of times) effectively returns the creature to the power and toughness it had before any switches.
You reveal all cards you intend to splice at the same time. Each individual card can be spliced only once onto any one spell.
A card with a splice ability can’t be spliced onto itself because the spell is on the stack (and not in your hand) when you reveal the cards you want to splice onto it.

You choose all targets for the spell after revealing cards you want to splice, including any targets required by the text of any of those cards. You may choose a different target for each instance of the word “target” on the resulting spell.
If all of the spell’s targets are illegal when the spell tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen.

cards.name: Through the Breach
cards.text:
You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.
Splice onto Arcane {2}{R}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

rulings.text: Putting the card onto the battlefield is optional. When the ability resolves, you can choose not to.
If all of the spell’s targets are illegal when the spell tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen.
You reveal all cards you intend to splice at the same time. Each individual card can be spliced only once onto any one spell.
A card with a splice ability can’t be spliced onto itself because the spell is on the stack (and not in your hand) when you reveal the cards you want to splice onto it.

You choose all targets for the spell after revealing cards you want to splice, including any targets required by the text of any of those cards. You may choose a different target for each instance of the word “target” on the resulting spell.

foreignData.name: Durch den Durchbruch

cards.name: Tide of War
cards.text: Whenever one or more creatures block, flip a coin. If you win the flip, each blocking creature is sacrificed by its controller. If you lose the flip, each blocked creature is sacrificed by its controller.

rulings.text: Tide of War’s ability triggers only once each combat and only if at least one blocker is declared. The effect does nothing to unblocked attacking creatures.
Tide of War’s controller always flips the coin. This means that you want to win the flip when you’re attacking but lose the flip when you’re defending.
Even if the blockers are sacrificed, any attackers that were blocked are still considered blocked.

foreignData.name: Wogen des Krieges

cards.name: Budoka Gardener // Dokai, Weaver of Life
cards.text: {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you control ten or more lands, flip Budoka Gardener.

rulings.text: Budoka Gardener flips if you control ten or more lands when its ability resolves, even if you don’t use its ability to put a land onto the battlefield.

Budoka Gardener flips even if you put a second copy of a legendary land onto the battlefield. You’ll have ten lands on the battlefield while the ability is resolving, so the Gardener flips. Then you will choose one of the legendary lands to keep and put the other into its owner’s graveyard as a state-based action.

cards.name: Heartbeat of Spring
cards.text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced.
cards.flavorText:
"It is true that we monks hold the key to paradise, but most don't understand that the paradise we guard is the one within."

rulings.text: The types of mana are white, blue, black, red, green, and colorless.
If you tap a land for more than one mana, you choose one type that was produced and add one mana of that type.

Heartbeat of Spring doesn't care about any restrictions or riders your lands put on the mana they produce, such as those of Unclaimed Territory and Cavern of Souls. It just produces one mana of the appropriate type, with no restrictions or riders.

cards.name: Iname, Life Aspect
cards.text: When Iname, Life Aspect dies, you may exile it. If you do, return any number of target Spirit cards from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavorText: Iname rejoices in the dawn of a new life, but soon becomes jealous of the simple joys denied him by his station. So the cycle begins anew.

rulings.text: The targets of Iname, Life Aspect’s ability are chosen when the ability is put onto the stack, but you don’t choose whether to exile Iname, Life Aspect until the ability resolves.
You may target Iname, Life Aspect. However, this doesn’t do anything since the card will no longer be in your graveyard when the creature cards are returned to your hand.
You can exile the card even if you choose no targets.

In a Commander game, you may send Iname to the Command Zone instead of exiling it during the resolution of its ability. If you do, its ability still works. Iname’s ability only requires that you attempted to exile it, not that it actually gets to the exile zone. This is similar to how destroying a creature (with, for example, Rest in Peace) doesn’t necessarily ensure that creature will end up in the graveyard; it just so happens that the action of exiling something and the exile zone both use the same word: “exile”.

foreignData.flavorText: Iname erfreut sich am Erwachen von neuem Leben, aber wird schon bald auf die kleinen Freuden, die ihm durch seinen Zustand verwehrt sind, neidisch. So beginnt der Kreislauf von neuem.

cards.name: Kodama's Might
cards.text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Splice onto Arcane {G} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

rulings.text: You reveal all cards you intend to splice at the same time. Each individual card can be spliced only once onto any one spell.
A card with a splice ability can’t be spliced onto itself because the spell is on the stack (and not in your hand) when you reveal the cards you want to splice onto it.

You choose all targets for the spell after revealing cards you want to splice, including any targets required by the text of any of those cards. You may choose a different target for each instance of the word “target” on the resulting spell.
If all of the spell’s targets are illegal when the spell tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen.

cards.name: Lure
cards.text:
Enchant creature
All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.
cards.flavorText: Jukai Forest was known for its secrets, which drew in many wayfarers and wizards. But it was those same secrets that kept most of those seekers from ever being heard from again.

rulings.text: Lure doesn’t give any creatures the ability to block the target creature. It just forces those creatures that are already able to block the creature to do so.

As blockers are declared, any creature that’s tapped or affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t block doesn’t block. If there’s a cost associated with having the creature block, no player is forced to pay that cost, so it doesn’t block if that cost isn’t paid.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Geheimnisse des Jukai-Waldes zogen viele Wanderer und Zauberer an. Aber es waren dieselben Geheimnisse, die dafür sorgten, dass von den meisten der Suchenden nie wieder etwas gehört wurde.

cards.name: Wear Away
cards.text:
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Splice onto Arcane {3}{G} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

rulings.text: You reveal all cards you intend to splice at the same time. Each individual card can be spliced only once onto any one spell.
A card with a splice ability can’t be spliced onto itself because the spell is on the stack (and not in your hand) when you reveal the cards you want to splice onto it.

You choose all targets for the spell after revealing cards you want to splice, including any targets required by the text of any of those cards. You may choose a different target for each instance of the word “target” on the resulting spell.
If all of the spell’s targets are illegal when the spell tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen.

rulings.text: The cost reduction applies to the total cost of the Arcane spell, including any additional costs from cards spliced onto it. However, the cost reduction applies only once to each Arcane spell. For example, if you cast an Arcane spell with mana cost {R} and splice onto it a card whose splice cost is {1}{U}, then the spell costs {U}{R} to cast. If you cast an Arcane spell with mana cost {4}{U} and splice onto it a card whose splice cost is {1}{R}, the spell costs {4}{U}{R} to cast.

cards.name: Sensei's Divining Top
cards.text:
{1}: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
{T}: Draw a card, then put Sensei's Divining Top on top of its owner's library.

rulings.text: Sensei’s Divining Top’s second ability may be activated in response to its first ability. If so, you’ll draw a card, put Sensei’s Divining Top on top of your library, and then look at the top three cards and rearrange them.
If Sensei’s Divining Top leaves the battlefield while its second ability is on the stack, you’ll draw a card and leave Sensei’s Divining Top in the zone it’s moved to.

cards.text:

rulings.text: Shell of the Last Kappa’s first ability can only target a spell that targets you.
Exiling a spell prevents that spell from resolving, but it doesn’t technically “counter” anything. This means that Shell of the Last Kappa can exile spells which “can’t be countered.”

{T}, Pay 2 life: Add {C}. If that mana is spent on an instant or sorcery spell, that spell can't be countered.

rulings.text: The spell can’t be countered if the mana produced by Boseiju is spent to cover any cost of the spell, even an additional cost such as a splice cost. This is true even if you pay an additional cost while casting a spell “without paying its mana cost.”
Suppose mana produced by Boseiju is spent on a spell and an effect creates a copy of that spell. The copy can be countered, even though the original can’t.
